channel.description: I love the song i think its awesome!!! :D

item.title: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames
item.dc:creator: @dbzmaster555 dbzmaster
item.description:
@dbzmaster555 wrote:

io9:

Dragonforce sucks in general. High-pitched girly voice + fast playing = fail and aids (+ a sucky band)

I think you suck in general. and you need to lose weight.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:38, topic:183479”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=245165.msg2260407#msg2260407 date=1212610638]

alot of people say they suck… well you will never be better than them…
[/quote]Yes i will. In fact, my band is already MUCH better than them. Recording demo this fall, it will result in a record contract and then an album.

How do you know you’re getting a contract if you don’t even have the demo recorded? :/[/quote]Record-Company contacts

Read full topic
item.source: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames

item.title: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames
item.dc:creator: @HAZEL HAZEL
item.description:
@HAZEL wrote:

I don’t really like the song or the band…It’s true that they can play but I’ve watched some live concerts and they suck at playing it live -.- They put too much notes in one solo I like fast solos but they just made it too fast…Besides that I think all their songs sound almost the same.

[quote=“Speljohan, post:30, topic:183479”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=245165.msg2260422#msg2260422 date=1212612057]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=245165.msg2260407#msg2260407 date=1212610638]

alot of people say they suck… well you will never be better than them…
[/quote]Yes i will. In fact, my band is already MUCH better than them. Recording demo this fall, it will result in a record contract and then an album.

Already have a small sample? I’d love to hear something new.
[/quote]Nothing recorded yet, but i do have some Guitar Pro tabs.[/quote]

Could you get me the GP tabs please?I play guitar and I’m searching for new things to play maybe you could help me ^^

Read full topic
item.source: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames

item.title: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:20, topic:183479”]They already have succeeded. People who don’t hang on every detail have listened to their music and embraced it as ‘good music’.[/quote]I have heard every single song by them and the only that is fairly good is “Valley of the Damned”. The rest are just generic and boring. And no, to go mainstream is NOT succeeding. Bands like Cynic, Necrophagist and Pestilence all succeeded, but they never became particularily popular.

Read full topic
item.source: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames

item.title: Dragonforce- through the fire and flames
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:18, topic:183479”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=245165.msg2239149#msg2239149 date=1211581199]

It’s incredibly boring and overrated.

QFT, herman ri is too much like: OMFG LOOK I AM PLAYING FAST!!1

He’s not really playing fast. He’s just tapping…
[/quote]
tapping is a way of playing fast…[/quote]Nevertheless, it’s tapping. I know of guitarists who can alternate pick this fast, now THAT is hard. Dragonforce is just too simple and generic to succeed as a band.

Read full topic
